sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RONCIGLIONE is a town of Italy, in the Ec-cleſiaſtic State, and Patrimony of St Peter, in E. Long. 13. N. Lat. 42. X2. It is a ſmall place, but had a pretty good trade, and was one of the richeſt in the province, while it belonged to the dukes of Parma, which was till 1649, when pope Innocent X. became maſter of it, and it has ever ſince continued in the poſſeſſion of his ſucceffors.
